results.description: In November 1983, two Dynamo Berlin footballers risked their lives as they fled to the West and left their whole lives behind in East Germany. This is their story.
results.shortTitle: The footballers who escaped from East Berlin
results.title: Dirk Schlegel and Falko GÃ¶tz: The East Berlin footballers who fled from the Stasi

altText: An East German guard peers through a hole in the Berlin Wall

results.description: Watch as Sebastian Polter scores a dramatic 87th minute penalty for Union Berlin, who beat inner city rivals Hertha Berlin in their first ever top flight derby.
results.shortTitle: Union Berlin score dramatic last-gasp penalty to beat rivals Hertha
results.title: Bundesliga: Union Berlin 1-0 Hertha Berlin - highlights

results.description: Football Focus visits Bundesliga side Union Berlin, a "rebellious" football club who are set to face Hertha Berlin for the first time ever in the top flight.
results.shortTitle: Union Berlin: 'A rebellious club in a rebellious city'
results.title: Union Berlin: The German fans who bled for their club

results.description: Union Berlin have a fanbase like no other - they literally bleed for their club and helped rebuild the stadium. Football Focus went to find out more...
results.shortTitle: The German fans who bleed for their club
results.title: Union Berlin: The German fans who bleed for their club

results.description: Robert Lewandowski becomes the first Bundesliga player to score in his club's first nine matches of the season as Bayern Munich beat Union Berlin 2-1 to go top.
results.shortTitle: Lewandowski sets record as Bayern go top
results.title: Bayern Munich 2-1 Union Berlin: Lewandowski breaks Bundesliga record

thumbnail.altText: Robert Lewandowski celebrates scoring for Bayern Munich

results.description: Watch highlights as FC Union Berlin claim their first win in the Bundesliga, with a 3-1 victory over Borussia Dortmund at the Stadion An der Alten Forsterei.
results.shortTitle: FC Union Berlin stun Dortmund to claim first Bundesliga win
results.title: Bundesliga: FC Union Berlin stun Dortmund to claim first win

results.description: Union Berlin claimed the first Bundesliga victory in their history as they stunned Borussia Dortmund.
results.title: Union Berlin 3-1 Borussia Dortmund: Union stun Dortmund for first Bundesliga win

results.description: Watch highlights from Union Berlin's first ever Bundesliga game, as they are beaten 4-0 by RB Leipzig.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Union Berlin beaten in first ever Bundesliga game
results.title: Bundesliga: FC Union Berlin 0-4 RB Leipzig highlights

results.description: Union Berlin pays tribute to lost fans and stage silent protest during their Bundesliga debut defeat by RB Leipzig.
results.shortTitle: Union Berlin lose on Bundesliga debut
results.title: Union Berlin 0-4 RB Leipzig: Hosts pay tribute to lost fans on Bundesliga debut
